name: Sleeping in the Dungeon
description:
Description of the gameplay:

This is my solo game project developed as part of the “my first game jam” event.

The gameplay works by pressing buttons on the screen  and clicking on visible objects of the environment. It is necessary to find a way out of the premises. The game is a set of consecutive small quests. Will our hero be able to escape from an incomprehensible situation and figure out what's going on here?
